title: Ep. #8 | DAVICHI, GOT7, and COLDE + AMA Special
description:
In this week’s episode, we discuss Davichi’s “Unspoken Words”, GOT7’s “ECLIPSE, and Colde’s “Your Dog Loves You (ft. Crush).” Eric also answers YOUR questions during his “Ask Me Anything” segment about the K-pop industry, career choices, etc. We announce WINNERS for the signed albums from Weki Meki and Yu Seung Woo. This week, we have a GOT7 ALBUM SIGNED by each of the members…make sure to listen to details on how you can win. As always, if you enjoy this podcast, make sure to subscribe and leave us a comment / rating on iTunes, Spotify, Soundcloud and YouTube. It helps us tremendously :). Thank you for listening, Daebak Show family! Connect with us on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook @daebakshow. Join our exclusive mailing list at www.daebakshow.com and be the first to know about new episodes, giveaways, special events, and other random things we have planned for you guys! #Davichi #GOT7 #Colde #WekiMeki #YuSeungWoo #EricNam #DaebakShow
 
 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

In this week’s episode, we discuss Davichi’s “Unspoken Words”, GOT7’s “ECLIPSE, and Colde’s “Your Dog Loves You (ft. Crush).” Eric also answers YOUR questions during his “Ask Me Anything” segment about the K-pop industry, career choices, etc. We announce WINNERS for the signed albums from Weki Meki and Yu Seung Woo. This week, we have a GOT7 ALBUM SIGNED by each of the members…make sure to listen to details on how you can win. As always, if you enjoy this podcast, make sure to subscribe and leave us a comment / rating on iTunes, Spotify, Soundcloud and YouTube. It helps us tremendously :).
